name: THE SECRET PROSTITUTES T-Shirt
description: Official "Viva La Evolución" two color design. The first black SP shirt- yipppeeeee!

name: THE SECRET PROSTITUTES Welcome To Punk, Viva La Evolución, We Can Do Whatever We Want 12"
description:
The Adderall consuming second full length from Houston's brand name different punk! These Diet McDoctors pull out all the stops with a well crafted masterpiece of modern music calling on all their hoity-toity hardcore superstar friends to create a milestone in Black Salsa Death Surf.
25 different songs in 7 different languages. In other words:

Welcome To Punk, Viva La Evolución, We Can Do Whatever We Want

U.S. of A pressing of 500 copies on black wax only- first press comes with an Obi strip. Cover art by Mike "DJ Crime-RC" Grayum.

*SOLD OUT*Diehard edition comes with a 2 color hand screened test press cover and 11x17 EXHUMED//THE SECRET PROSTITUTES gig flyer.

name: WAR MASTER Blood Dawn 12"
description:
Waring death metal destroyers WAR MASTER return after a strategic reforging with a new vocalist and drummer to decimate whomever was left standing after the release of their full length. Four songs demonstrating audio artillery superiority to conquer all enemies of WAR MASTER. No peace talks, no prisoners, and no surrender- any survivors will witness the rise of the Blood Dawn!

Cover/center label art by Neal Dossey. Logos by Daniel Shaw.

*SOLD OUT*Die hard edition of only 50 copies comes on clear vinyl includes a loose CD version of the 12", full color die cut sticker, silk screened patch, and a 2-color hand screened test press cover as well as the regular cover.

Clear vinyl edition limited to 200 copies.

Black vinyl edition limited to 800 copies.

name: WAR MASTER Blood Dawn CDep
description:
Waring death metal destroyers WAR MASTER return after a strategic reforging with a new vocalist and drummer to decimate whomever was left standing after the release of their full length. Four songs demonstrating audio artillery superiority to conquer all enemies of WAR MASTER. No peace talks, no prisoners, and no surrender- any survivors will witness the rise of the Blood Dawn!

Cover art by Neal Dossey. Back cover/discface art by Daniel Shaw.

name: GRIDE//TURBOKRIEG 6"
description:
Fresh off of two tours together, a split 6" solidifies the sordid love affair between these two bands:

GRIDE, the czars of Bohemian powercore, offer 3 well crafted blastworks of literary assault including a Y cover. 
TURBOKRIEG, the twinks of Texas mega-speed, support with 5 episodes of low attention span spacejamming channel changers.

Comes on red vinyl in a full color pocket sleeve.

name: THE SECRET PROSTITUTES test press 12"
description:
Test press of the upcoming second LP from THE SECRET PROSTITUTES Welcome To Punk, Viva La Evolución, We Can Do Whatever We Want... Comes with an insert and a 2-color hand screened cover. Only 25 made.
These are the last 10 copies.

Only one per customer on this one. Any orders with multiple copies have and will be cancelled/refunded!

name: GRIDE//TURBOKRIEG 7" test press
description:
Ok- this is the test press 7" version of the split 6" that will be released August 20th. Only 50 of these were made for the GRIDE/TURBOKRIEG east coast tour and these will be the only copies pressed as a 7"... Only a few left.

GRIDE, the czars of Czech powercore, offer 3 well crafted blastworks of literary assault including a Y cover.
TURBOKRIEG, the twinks of Texas mega-speed, support with 5 episodes of low attention span spacejamming channel changers.

name: GRIDE Shirt
description: Official GRIDE shirts! White ink screened on a rainbow of different shirt colors... Scroll through the options to see size and shirt colors!

name: ISKALLT REGN Demo '13 Tape
description: Texas torn-knee denim jacket bombcore hardpunk huffers' debut recording. Five trax of ice cold noisecharged nonsense in knuckle-headed psuedo-swedish. Pro-printed blue shell cassettes with full color covers. This incarnation contains members of ABDUKTION, WAR MASTER, and SIK MENTALITY. Limited to 200 copies.

name: FUGITIVE FAMILY Saddest Story Ever Told 7"
description:
Repeat offender press of the FUGITIVE FAMILY Saddest Story Ever Told EP originally released on Vinyl Junkie records. Curmudgeonly hateful New Orleans/Houston gulf coast black punk. Ugly audio as only ill tempered punk lifers can produce, stitched together out of vile contempt for all that is. REASON OF INSANITY reincarnated, these scumbags are also in BLOODY HAMMER, THE PALLBEARERS and THE SECRET PROSTITUTES.

300 pressed.

name: SACCAGE Death Crust Satanique 12"
description:
Pillaging dope fueled motorcrust speedpunk deathbeat evil from the filthiest sewage riddled alleyways of Quebec. Twelve mad thrash blasters to polish your bullet belt to- thats one song per inch! Never stop the madness!

Limited to 500 copies on color wax.

name: VERSKLAVEN 12"
description:
Vinyl debut of epic Texas female fronted ripperpunk warcrust metal brigade stench from WAR MASTER/DISSENT personnel re-modeling the ANTISECT, AXEGRINDER, SACRILEGE prototypes. Five distortion hymns out from the void - play dementedly loud and worship the great ones quietly! Cover art courtesy of Daniel Shaw.

Limited to 500 copies on a variety of split color vinyl.

options.name: Dual edged alabaster Orcrist marbled blade
Sea of Rhûn foam/Lonely Mountain slate

name: TURBOKRIEG 7"
description:
Scene ripping Space City mega-speed disgracing the copse of Dimebag. Nasa approved paleo-blast future thrash over-thrusters that contain current and former members of WAR MASTER, DISSENT, NIBIRU, PLF, INSECT WARFARE, 50/50, MACHINE GUN ROMANTICS and more.

Limited to 250 copies on black wax.

name: HELLBASTARD - DISSENT 7"
description:
UK crust originators HELLBASTARD team up with TX crust grinding disciples DISSENT! 3 brand new tracks from DISSENT for their first 7” release and 2 tracks from HELLBASTARD, one from 2009 and one re-recorded track from their 1986 Rippercrust demo.

Limited to only 500 copies with cover art from artist Daniel Shaw (INSECT WARFARE, STORMCROW, WAR MASTER, MUNICIPAL WASTE)

Last 20 copies found! After that- gone for good!

name: THE real ENERGY - THE SECRET PROSTITUTES 7"
description:
The pill-popping Tom Petty arena punk blues firm of THE REAL ENERGY matching wits with the uber-retardo Indo-tejano A.D.D. punk of THE SECRET PROSTITUTES. One highbrow epic honky art jam against seven cat urine soaked jingle-jangles that ain't even in English. Hide all your drugs and your green cards- these rockers are out to punk you right good.

Comes in 3 colors, only 300 made- dig it.

name: CRIME WAVE Double Feature Special 12"
description: Houston hardcore harbingers herald their third coming with a dubious double feature special. Containing two EPs whose concepts and recordings are completely separate from one another: Side A's five songs deal critically corrupted control in Nazi Sex whereas Side B's eleven shorter bursts bear witness to forfeited feral freewill in Gospel Convulsions. Limited to only 300 copies on clear vinyl- so break out the popcorn and catch the wave, suckers!

name: THE DRÜNKS Shirt
description: 2 color print of the Death Dealer LP back cover.

name: THE SECRET PROSTITUTES Архив CD
description:
Komplete konfederate KGB archive of kommie klan kowboy A.D.D. fueled KBD gestapo punk. Catchier than VD, sexier than OOP, chopped, screwed and BBQ'd: Houston's sultans of strange bounce through over an hour of tracks from the LP, the 3 studio 7"s, the live 7", the split 7" and a few unreleased hit singles. Highly polished professional performances guaranteed!

51 tracks in all. First press comes complete with an obi strip!

name: WAR MASTER Pyramid Of The Necropolis 12"
description:
WAR MASTER continues their campaign of dystopian dismembering death metal demolition poised for worldwide domination with the unleashing of their first full length LP, Pyramid Of The Necropolis. Terminating sonic necropocalyptic carnage forged into the grave of  ancient masters and sharpened down the left hand path. Eight ritualistic offerings to the maddening altar of the chaos realms. The persevering sound of the underground suffocating in tyrannical Texas heat!
Cover art from vocalist Daniel Shaw with slick matte/spot gloss printing and insert. First press comes with a 19x28 poster!


Regular Black vinyl edition limited to 800. Down to the last copies...

Blue vinyl edition limited to 200 was thought to be sold out, but I just found a box of 10 copies stashed aside!!

name: WAR MASTER Pyramid Of The Necropolis CD
description: CD version of the LP from Rescued From Life Records.

name: CRIME WAVE Modern Lobotomies 7"
description:
These Texan punk perps are back in the saddle with their five shooter loaded full of hot hardcore action! Note the maturing tendency of exploring relevant punk rock themes: Deceased celebrity evangelists, African dictators, oil tycoons, what evil lurks in the hearts of men and William Shatner's dick. Still members of SECRET PROSTITUTES, PMRC and NO TALK.

Limited to 300 copies on green wax!

name: H.R.A Heavy Roach Activity 12"
description: Hatefilled Houston assholes' debut LP of frenzied old school pre-crossover hardcore thrash. 20 blasts of punk fury played with such youthful abandon and speed, only the raw anger tells you these old fucks have been toiling in underground bands since the 80's! Members of KRULLER, HYPOCHRISTIANS, HAS BEEN & EVIL INCARNATE. Limited to 500 on color wax!

name: CRIME WAVE Savage Reaction 12"
description: Treacherous Texas punk perpertrator's debut 12"! Raw deal Houston hardcore with PMRC, NO TALK & THE SECRET PROSTITUTES members igniting an unrelenting wave of savage criminal intent towards rock n' roll. Limited to 300 on clear blue wax!

name: PSUDOKU Space Grind CD
description: Debut CD of demented Norwegian progressive space grind fusion. Plays like DISCORDANCE AXIS downloading YES albums while teleconferencing with NETJAJEV SS and Stephen Hawkins. Ex-PARLAMENTARISK SODOMI! Limited to 500 copies.

name: LEFT IN RUINS Sound Of Defeat CD
description: A stock pile of seriously scathing suicidal Swedish speedcore! 39 tracks collecting the band’s entire catalogue on CD: the 10”, 7”, split LP with MRTVA BUDOUCNOST and comp tracks. Think INTENSE DEGREE backed with more blasting meets G-ANX with all the wanky parts surgically removed. Limited to 500 copies.

name: REASON OF INSANITY Violence 10"
description: Last will and testament by the most underrated US hardcore punk band of the millenium. As originators of Gulf Coast Hardcore, these Texas/Lousiana punk assholes had released numerous EPs/splits on the great but now defunct Burrito Records and have shared members with such underground mainstays as GOVERNMENT WARNING, INSECT WARFARE, MUNICIPAL WASTE, SKELETON WITCH, DIRECT CONTROL and PLF among others. This final recording sees the band mutating into 70's Euro punk with keeping the weird Italian hardcore sound they're known for. Members are currently in NO TALK, SECRET PROSTITUTES, HOMOPOLICE and BLOODY HAMMER. Limited to only 300 copies on color vinyl with hand screened covers!

name: GRIDE Faster Than Life, Harder Than Death CD
description: Speed obsessed Czech ultracore terror that peels the face off thrashers and grinders alike. Here we have 54 songs from over 10 years of releases clocking in at well over an hour- more Eastern Bloc speed rock than you can safely shake a broken drum stick at. Calling inspiration from such grind/hardcore greats as Infest and Napalm Death (both of which they cover here), Gride has created a truly original sound in mostly stagnant genre. A true punk gem and the pinnacle of fast. Limited to only 500 copies.

name: WAR MASTER Thrones Of Tyranny 7"
description:
Houston’s tyrannical old school death metal mercenaries’ debut 7” single full of the powercrazed carnage found on their sold out demo with added monstrous war mongering madness for the mentally murdered. Contains ex members of INSECT WARFARE and BLASPHERIAN with current members of DISSENT and NIBIRU.

Last copy up now- after that this record is sold out!!

name: THE DRUNKS Death Dealer 12"
description: Der death dealing debut LP from The Drünks. Detrimental black out heavy metal rock n’ roll alcoholocast over a decade in the making. Imagine Motorhead in a bare-knuckle brawl with Venom outside of some Texas dive bar and you get an idea of what you’re in for: 8 tracks of loud beer basted grim reapin' bloodshed including a Bathory and Kreator cover. Limited to only 500 copies with epic cover art from artist Daniel Shaw (Insect Warfare, Abigail, War Master, Hirax) that would make Frazetta proud.

name: NASHGUL El Dia Después Al Fin De La Humanidad gatefold 12"
description: Incinerating Spanish grind warriors’ first full length LP! Bludgeoning brain infecting blasts of social horror housed in a gatefold with wrap around zombie art and a Metal Punk Division poster. From the same rotting soil as LOOKING FOR AN ANSWER, GRUESOME STUFF RELISH and HEAMORRHAGE plus sharing a member with MACHETAZO- this solidifies Spain’s current title as heavy weight grind champions of the world! Includes lyrics in both Spanish and English, a bonus REPULSION cover not on the CD version, and mailorder gets limited color wax!

name: VACANT COFFIN Sewer Skullpture 12"
description: Forensic Finnish old school death metal grind that goes down thick and toxic like every band on the Grindcrusher comp mixed in a blender with GRAVE and DISMEMBER added for protein! Members of PHLEGETHON and HOODED MENACE. Limited to 500 copies, mailorder gets sewage color wax!

name: NOISEAR//SUPERBAD//SEAN Grindcore Marauders 12"
description: Hot off the heels of the 2nd NOISEAR//SUPERBAD US tour! New Mexican grind terror teams with Portland blast crusaders and Seattle instrumental prog-grind duo to campaign for complete speed noise domination! 19 tracks that include 3 collaborations with members from each band- one of which is a MAN IS THE BASTARD cover! The answer to the age old question: What would have happened if DISCORDANCE AXIS and ASSUCK shared a split with NAKED CITY covering GOBLIN?

name: EMBALMING THEATRE//ARCHAGATHUS 7"
description: Stellar Swiss History Channel true life death grinders meet Canadian mucus munching mincecore maniacs. The prolific EMBALMING THEATRE strikes again with three blood drenched tracks (including a PUNGENT STENCH cover) and the proto-prolific ARCHAGATHUS (historical song of the legendary AGATHOCLES) regurgitate four putrid tunes. Packaged in full color covers limited to only 500 copies!

name: GRUESOME STUFF RELISH Horror Rises From The Tomb 12"
description:
The cursed zombies from Spain have returned from the beyond to consume your flesh once again! GRUESOME STUFF RELISH has finally arrived with Horror Rises From The Tomb on vinyl!! 19 songs of freshly dug-up horror Death Metal and Grind done the way this music was originally intended, absolutely no modern influences plague this epic feast! Instead you get nothing but the most catchy and well played death/grind songs in the style of early masters such as IMPETIGO, XYSMA, NECRONY, and CARNAGE. At the same time paying homage to the morbid and gore-drenched Italian and Spanish horror films from the 70's and early 80's!
Featuring incredible full-color cover artwork by the new master of horror comics, Jeff Zornow and a special guest vocal appearance by none other than Stevo, lead vocalist of the legendary IMPETIGO themselves!

name: IN DISGUST San Jose Oldies Vol. 1 CD
description:
Fuck off, this is Shark's territory! San Jose's grind violence storm troopin' superstars' complete discography thus far. Their dream destroying DESPISE YOU inspired demo (songs from which have been featured on both 625's Trapped In A Scene and Bay Area Thrash comps), the brutal noise blasting epic Reality Choke 10", the SIDETRACKED split, MASSGRAVE split, uncut live radio show split set with GODSTOMPER, and even a couple unreleased songs.
Like EXCRUCIATING TERROR? Like power violence?

name: WEAK MINDS 7"
description: Introducing another chapter in the New Wave Of Gulf Coast Power Violence: WEAK MINDS!! Debut release of total MAN IS THE BASTARD/CROSSED OUT inspired hardcore blasts from INSECT WARFARE's bass player (not the guy from HATRED SURGE, but yet another Texan power violence junkie that moonlights in IW!) 15 head exploding bursts of hardcore fury including a LE SCRAWL cover with vocals by RAHI of INSECT WARFARE!

name: FRIGHTMARE Midnight Murder Mania 12"
description: "Midnight Murder Mania" finally released in a deluxe vinyl edition from Torture Garden Picture Company. 11 tracks of horrific face shredding "stalk and slash grind" that will leave you screaming for more! Their Gore soaked holocaust is fueled by the Ultra violent Slasher movies of the 70's and 80's. With songs such as Midnight Murder Mania, Cropsy and Friday the 13th, Frightmare pays homage to the days when Horror movies were blood drenched and sleazy.

name: COFFINS Warhead 7"
description: Found the last few of these. Japan's COFFINS covering VENOM's Warhead. Side A studio, side B live. Comes with killer artwork by Daniel Shaw. Only 200 made.

name: RAINBOW OF DEATH 10"
description: France's female fronted fasties first full release. Blasting Bayonne blacking pop violence noisepunk attack! Completely cute and kvlt at the same time... Members of doom masters MONARCH and the now dead GEORGE BITCH JR. Packaged in a thick 10" jacket with heavy stock inner sleeves. Design by Candy Kill Industries. Mailorder copies com on dual colored wax!!

name: BRODY'S MILITIA//VOETSEK//WIDESPREAD BLOODSHED Weapons Of Thrash Destruction 6"
description: A one-sided six song six inch limited to six hundred and sixty six copies on purple people eater wax and silk screened on the b-side. 2 tracks from each band released for their 2005 tour.

name: F.K.Ü. Horror Metal Moshing Machine 7"
description:
Limited to 500 copies on trash colored wax. Cover art by Bill Hauser.

Review:
If you're a fan of 80's thrash, you really can't go wrong with this band. They have a sound that's somewhere between Exodus and Anthrax. Their lyrics cover the gamut of thrash topics, with a definite nod to the humorous subjects covered by Stormtroopers of Death. You don't have to tell FKU that this has all been done before; they know this. FKU are having a great time playing these tunes. You should have a great time listening to them.

The first track has a nice thrash pace, with lots of Anthrax and SOD influence, especially in the mosh part. The singer has a little Zetro in his vocals until the end of the song when he lets the falsetto fly. The lyrics are especially funny as they contain a lot of song titles of classic thrash tunes strung together to make sentences that actually make sense. The second track is a Tankard cover. This song stays pretty faithful to the original, though the ripping solo in the middle has a strong Slayer feel with lots of whammy bar abuse.
